Title: Relates to prohibiting industrial development agencies from incentivizing movements within the state
Summary: Prohibits industrial development agencies from incentivizing movements within the state where any plant, facility, or personnel of the project occupant are abandoned or removed.
LawCode: Amd ยง862, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to prohibiting industrial development agencies from incentivizing movements within the state
